<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// strerror&#95;r is thread-safe.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if defined(&#95;&#95;GLIBC&#95;&#95;) &amp;&amp; defined(&#95;GNU&#95;SOURCE)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// glibc defines its own incompatible version of strerror&#95;r</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which may not use the buffer supplied.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlight">  str = strerror&#95;r(errnum, buffer, MaxErrStrLen - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlight">  strerror&#95;r(errnum, buffer, MaxErrStrLen - 1);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#elif HAVE&#95;DECL&#95;STRERROR&#95;S </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;Windows Secure API&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlight">  strerror&#95;s(buffer, MaxErrStrLen - 1, errnum);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Copy the thread un-safe result of strerror into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the buffer as fast as possible to minimize impact</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of collision of strerror in multiple threads.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
